description: This file contains in-memory data stores and utility functions for managing entities such as Users, Assets, Transcripts, Quotes, and ExportJobs within a software project. It includes functions for generating IDs and retrieving user data, serving as a simplified data layer for MVP development.

methods.name: _next_id
methods.description: Increments and returns a sequential ID with the specified prefix, updating the internal counter.

methods.name: generate_id
methods.description: Generates a predictable ID for a given resource kind using the internal counter.

methods.name: get_user
methods.description: Fetches a User object from the in-memory USERS store by user ID.
